name: 2nd International Conference on Woman and Child Health
content: Greetings from Women Health 2022!! With great pride and honour we would like to invite you to the “2nd International Conference on Woman and Child Health” during March 24-25, 2022 at Rome, Italy. This conference is focusing on the theme “Lets foster the opportunities for every woman and child to be healthy”. For more details Women Health 2022 if you are interested write to: auroraangela2319@gmail.com
